title: (x) very simple slab serif "Bathe" - Freshman {Anastas}
content:
Hi all! I thought this would be an easy font to find as it's so basic, however I am having no luck finding something quite like it. At first I thought it was Machine, but that's got no serifs and is even more basic. "What the font" on myfonts.com can't come up with a match either. Anyone have any ideas?   
   
 ![Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20050524130921im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69362.jpg)
author: the_goodgardener9
